revised_title: Three-dimensional Separated Flow Structure Over Prolate Spheroids: A Visual Analysis
tldr: This study investigates the three-dimensional surface flow patterns over prolate spheroids to understand the separated flow structure. The researchers used a water-tunnel and a new paint-coating method to visualize the surface flow patterns and answer questions about open and closed separation. The findings provide a better understanding of the flow behavior and help improve the design of aerospace vehicles and other engineering applications.
